Detailed Description

Represent learning set.

Learning set consists of set of hypothesis sets, one hypothesis set for one example.

Get access to single hypothesis set.

Parameters:
index index of hypothesis set. For performance reasons the progressive access will be prefered.

hypothesis set at specified index, or NULL if no hypothesis set can be accessed.
